PYQT App Tabs

Tabs

AssignInstructor Tab

class pyqtTabs.AssignInstructor.AssignInstructorTab[source]

Bases: QWidget

assign_instructor()[source]

Assigns an instructor to a course and updates the local copy

Validates the assignment process and displays success or error messages using a QMessageBox.

init_ui()[source]

Initializes the UI of the AssignInstructorTab. Sets up the layout and adds all the components

on_course_select()[source]

Updates the course_var attribute with the selected course_id

on_instructor_select()[source]

Updates the instructor_var attribute with the selected instructor_id

unassign_instructor()[source]

Unassigns an instructor to a course and updates the local copy

Validates the unassignment process and displays success or error messages using a QMessageBox.

update_ui()[source]

Updates the UI for the course and instructor dropdown to reflect new data

Course Tab

class pyqtTabs.CourseTab.AddCourseTab[source]

Bases: QWidget

create_course()[source]

Adds a course to the db and updates local copy

Validates the create process and displays success or error messages using a QMessageBox.

delete_course()[source]

Deletes a course from the db and updates local copy

Validates the delete process and displays success or error messages using a QMessageBox.

edit_course()[source]

Updates a course in the db and updates local copy

Validates the edit process and displays success or error messages using a QMessageBox.

init_ui()[source]

on_select()[source]

Updates the course_var attribute with the selected course_id and input labels

update_ui()[source]

Updated the UI for the course dropdown to relfect new data

Exports the current table data to a CSV file.

Reloads the data from the shared.py and refreshes the table data.

search_data()[source]

Filters the data in the current table based on the search query entered by the user.

show_courses()[source]

Displays the course data in the table widget with appropriate headers.

show_instructors()[source]

Displays the instructor data in the table widget with appropriate headers.

show_students()[source]

Displays the student data in the table widget with appropriate headers.

update_table_data(data)[source]

Updates the table widget data

Parameters:

data (list) – List of row data to display in the table widget.

update_table_headers(headers)[source]

Updates the headers of the table widget

Parameters:

headers (list) – List of headers to set in the table widget.
